text:
The documentation page for <condition> doesn't say that a condition tag must 
be place inside a <target> tag.
creator: bn@smartobjects.be
steve_l@iseran.com
text:
true, but neither do all the other tasks. better to add a paragraph in the 
using ant doc, using.html to make it clear that only <property> and <taskdef> 
can live outside targets. Care to submit a documentation patch?

You are right but in the case of condition it is a bit more confusing has this 
tag is used to set a property. A user can thing that he can replace property 
tag with a condition tag. That's at least the mistake I made.
Yes I agree to submit a patch once we agree on what to do.
creator: bn@smartobjects.be
